Uses of Class
com.projetloki.genesis.MediaFeature

  • Packages that use MediaFeature 
    Package Description
    com.projetloki.genesis
    A library for generating CSS from Java (Tutorial).

    • Uses of MediaFeature in com.projetloki.genesis

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MediaFeature MediaFeature.aspectRatio(int w, int h)
      Returns a feature that checks that the ratio of width to height is exactly the given ratio.
      static MediaFeature MediaFeature.color()
      Returns a feature that checks that the device is a color device.

      Returns a feature that checks that the number of bits per color is exactly the given number.

      Returns a feature that checks that the number of entries in the color lookup table is exactly the given number.

      Returns a feature that checks that the ratio of device width to device height is exactly the given ratio.

      Returns a feature that checks that the width of the output device's rendering surface is exactly the given length.
      static MediaFeature MediaFeature.grid()
      Returns a feature that checks that the output device is grid (versus bitmap).
      static MediaFeature MediaFeature.grid(boolean grid)
      Returns a feature that checks that the output device is grid if true, or bitmap if false.

      Returns a feature that checks that the height of the targeted display area is exactly the given length.
